description:
Inspector Lunge investigates the murder of a prostitute and suspects a senator named Dr. Boltzmann of involvement. His dedication to his work however takes a toll on his family life.
Meanwhile, the vindictive Eva continues to press Lunge to catch Tenma. She also has a new lover, her gardener.
[I]Source: thetvdb.com[/I]

titles.title: Un homme abandonné - Une femme délaissée
残された男・残された女
